description: This file contains CSS styles for managing the visual theme of a React application, including light and dark theme color variables and styles for components like App, App-logo, and theme toggle button.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with settings for text alignment and background color.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Logo container with specific height and pointer events settings.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header container for the application with styles for background, layout, and font size.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link styles representing theme-based color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for switching themes with custom styles for positioning, colors, and hover effects.
